name: Customer
desc: Constructor of an Customer object

name: birthDay
desc: Day of birth of the Customer

name: birthMonth
desc: Month of birth of the Customer

name: birthYear
desc: Year of the Customer

name: city
desc: City of the Customer

name: firstName
desc: First name of the Customer

name: lastName
desc: Last name of the Customer

name: postalCode
desc: Postal code of the Customer

name: province
desc: Province of the Customer

name: streetAddress
desc: Street address of the Customer

name: CustomerDAO
desc: Creates DAO for Customer object

name: deleteCustomer
desc: Deletes a Customer object from the database

name: getAllCustomers
desc: Returns a list of all Customer objects from the database

name: insertCustomer
desc: Adds a new Customer object to the database

name: updateCustomer
desc: Updates a Customer object in the database

name: addCallback
desc: Adds a database Callback to the builder.

name: addMigrations
desc: Adds migrations to the builder.

name: build
desc: Creates the database and initializes it.

name: databaseBuilder
desc:
Creates a database builder for a persistent database.
Once a database is built, you should keep a reference to it and re-use it.

name: inMemoryDatabaseBuilder
desc:
Creates a database builder for an in memory database.
Information stored in an in memory database disappears when the process is killed.
Once a database is built, you should keep a reference to it and re-use it.

name: CustomerDatabase
desc: Creates database for Customer entity

name: customerDAO
desc: Returns DAO for interact with the database in the app

name: CustomerListPage
desc: Page for Customer List

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: addCustomer
desc: Adds a new customer

name: adding
desc: Whether the user is currently adding a new customer.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: copyFromPreviousCustomer
desc: Asks the user whether to copy the previous customer's information

name: customerDAO
desc: Data Access Object for performing CRUD operations on Customer database

name: customerForm
desc: Returns the form widget used for entering or editing customer details

name: customerList
desc: The list of all customers fetched from the database

name: detailsPage
desc: Builds the page for the customer's detail page

name: displayInstructions
desc: Displays an AlertDialog with instructions for how to use the interface.

name: dispose
desc: Disposes all text editing controllers when the widget is removed from the tree

name: editCustomer
desc: Updates the selected customer's information

name: editing
desc: Whether the user is currently editing an existing customer.

name: encryptedPrefs
desc: Encrypted shared preferences used to save the last added customer's data

name: initState
desc:
Initializes the state by loading all customers from the database
and preparing all input controllers.

name: listPage
desc: Builds the page for the main list

name: loadCustomerToPrefs
desc: Loads the last saved customer data from EncryptedSharedPreferences

name: reactiveLayout
desc: Returns the appropriate layout depending on screen orientation

name: removeCustomer
desc: Asks user to confirm and remove selected customer

name: saveCustomerToPrefs
desc: Saves the latest customer info to EncryptedSharedPreferences

name: selectedCustomer
desc: Currently selected customer for editing

name: deleteEvent
desc: Deletes the given event from the database.

name: getAllEvents
desc: Returns a list of all events stored in the database.

name: insertEvent
desc: Inserts a new event into the database.

name: updateEvent
desc: Updates an existing event in the database.

name: addCallback
desc: Adds a database Callback to the builder.

name: addMigrations
desc: Adds migrations to the builder.

name: build

desc:
Creates a database builder for a persistent database.
Once a database is built, you should keep a reference to it and re-use it.

desc:
Creates a database builder for an in memory database.

name: eventDao
desc: Returns the EventDao to perform CRUD operations with the database.

name: EventItem
desc: A data model class which represents an event entity in the database.

name: EventItem
desc: Creates an EventItem with the specified details.

name: ID
desc: A static counter used to generate unique IDs of new events.

name: eventDate
desc: The date of the event.

name: eventDescription
desc: The description about the event.

name: eventLocation
desc: The location where the event will be occurred.

name: eventName
desc: The name or title of the event.

name: eventTime
desc: The time of the event.

name: id
desc: The unique identifier (primary key) for the event.

name: toString
desc: Returns a formatted string representation of the event.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: Expense
desc: Represents an expense record in the local database.

name: Expense
desc: Constructor for creating a new Expense object.

name: amount
desc: The amount spent, stored as a double

name: category
desc: The category of the expense

name: date
desc: The date of the expense in string format

name: id
desc: Primary key for the expense entry. Automatically generated by the database.

name: name
desc: The name or title of the expense

name: paymentMethod
desc: The method of payment used

name: ExpenseDAO
desc: performing database operations on the Expense table.

name: deleteExpense
desc: Deletes a specific expense record from the database.

name: getAllExpenses
desc: Retrieves all expenses from the database.

name: insertExpense
desc: Inserts a new expense record into the database.

name: updateExpense
desc: Updates an existing expense record in the database.

desc: Adds a database Callback to the builder.

name: addMigrations
desc: Adds migrations to the builder.

desc: Creates the database and initializes it.

desc:
Creates a database builder for a persistent database.
Once a database is built, you should keep a reference to it and re-use it.

name: ExpenseDatabase
desc: The class for managing data.

name: ExpenseTrackerPage
desc:
A page that allows users to track their expenses.
Users can add, update, view, and delete expenses.
Data is saved using SQLite and also saved temporarily using EncryptedSharedPreferences.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: MaintenanceRecord
desc:
This class contains information for vehicle maintenance record including vehicle name, vehicle type,
service type, service date, mileage and cost.

name: ID
desc: Identifier that tracks the next available ID.

name: MaintenanceRecord
desc: Construct MaintenanceRecord object with properties.

name: id
desc: Unique identifier for the maintenance record.

name: maintenanceCost
desc: The cost charged for the maintenance service.

name: mileage
desc: The mileage of vehicle at the time of maintenance.

name: serviceDate
desc: The date of maintenance service.

name: serviceType
desc: The type of maintenance service.

name: vehicleName
desc: The name of vehicle for maintenance.

name: vehicleType
desc: The type of vehicle for maintenance.

name: MaintenanceRecordDAO
desc: Data access object to perform CRUD operations on MaintenanceRecord.

name: deleteRecord
desc: Delete a maintenanceRecord from the database.

name: getAllRecords
desc: Retrieve all maintenance records from database.

name: getRecordByID
desc: Retrieve the specific maintenance record by its ID.

name: insertRecord
desc: Insert a new maintenanceRecord into the database.

name: updateRecord
desc: Update the existing maintenanceRecord in the database.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: addNewRecord
desc: Add a new maintenance record to the list and save it to the database.

name: addRecord
desc: The flag to indicate if a new record is being added.

name: build
desc: Build the main user interface of the vehicle maintenance app.

name: clearPref
desc: Clear all saved maintenance record data from the encrypted shared preference.

name: deleteRecord
desc: Delete the currently selected maintenance record from the list and database.

name: displayDeleteDialog
desc: Display a dialog to prompt user to whether delete the current maintenance record.

name: displayLoadPrefsDialog
desc: Display a dialog to prompt user to whether reuse previously entered record information.

name: dispose
desc: Dispose all text controllers to free up resources.

name: initState
desc: Setup controllers for each text input fields.

name: listRecordPage
desc: Return the page with all maintenance record list.

name: loadPrefs
desc: Retrieve and load the previous maintenance record input data.

name: maintenanceRecord
desc: The list containing all maintenance record information.

name: modifyRecordPage
desc: Returns maintenance record details page for user to add new record, update or delete existing record.

name: reactiveLayout
desc: Return the main layout widget for the body of the screen.

name: recordDAO
desc: The data access object to interact with vehicle maintenance record database.

name: resetTextFields
desc: Reset all text fields to blank.

name: savePrefs
desc: Save the maintenance record input data to encrypted shared preference.

name: selectedRecord
desc: The currently selected maintenance record, or "null" if none is selected.

name: updateRecord
desc: Update the currently selected maintenance record with new values.
